original_text: And the Lord shall make thee plenteous in goods, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy cattle, and in the fruit of thy ground, in the land which the Lord sware unto thy fathers to give thee.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 주리라고 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅에서 네게 복을 주사 네 몸의 소생과 가축의 새끼와 토지의 소산을 많게 하시며

sentences.original_text: And the Lord shall make thee plenteous in goods
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 너를 물질로 풍성하게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: in the fruit of thy body
and in the fruit of thy cattle
and in the fruit of thy ground
in the land which the Lord sware unto thy fathers
